home.description: This is a collection of powerful tools for Minecraft.

ffsettings.title: FF Settings
ffsettings.description: Here are sensitivity settings for the game Garena Free Fire for various devices.

mcbedrock.title: MCBedrock
mcbedrock.description: Here you will find the latest news as well as changelogs for Minecraft.

strongholdFinder.title: Portal Seeker App
strongholdFinder.description: Here you can easily find the stronghold portal using your coordinates and throwing angle.

mcids.title: MC IDs App
mcids.description: Here you can easily find block IDs, items, particles, etc. from Minecraft.
